title: DIH - Provide periodic autoupdate capability. Allow ability to specify an interval for autoupdate in DIH config.
description:
Currently DIH supports full import and delta import.

If I want to set up create an index from data in DB and want to keep my index uptodate, DIH does not provide any ability to periodically update the index by running the delta query automatically.

comments.author: Noble Paul
comments.content: no new feature requests for Solr1.4 we are closer to a release
